website_summaries.verdict: A snug fit that protects your Xbox One S well.
pros: This foam case is designed to fit your Xbox One S perfectly, with room for 1 controller
The overall design is compact and fairly lightweight
The Xbox One X can be fit by cutting the foam
cons: No room for games, additional controllers, or cables

customer_reviews.title: Works Great as Case, AND Portable Gaming Setup.
customer_reviews.text: Item works well, Xbox is a little tricky to fit into the prefab foam, but is a solid hold. I have modified the case and added a screen to use the Xbox wherever I want to. works great
customer_reviews.author: 01Beaker

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit. Works with g-story screen.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job holding my x box one s along with the G-story screen. I modified the foam a little to receive the G-story screens power supply. I might do it some more to accept the Rig 800 transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Great for transportation or storage of the Xbox One S
customer_reviews.text: I used this case to transport my Xbox One S when I went to visit my family. My Xbox, controller, and cables fit snuggly/securely. It held up just fine in my check-in luggage on the plane. My Xbox worked during my trip (we setup 2 on the home network for us to play together) and it worked fine when I got back home. I used a carabiner to keep the lid closed and because I was sure TSA would check the case and I didn't want them to break a lock. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great way to transport the Xbox One S
customer_reviews.text: Great way to transport the Xbox One S. Controller fit made me nervous but worked out great. The Xbox itself fit snug, which made me confident it would be okay during travel. I put this in my checked luggage on a flight recently, and it came out no worse for the wear, Xbox and controller both functioning perfectly. Case seems like it's made from quality materials. If I had any gripes, it's that I wish the dedicated power cord storage would also fit an HDMI cable. Beyond that, this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walen

customer_reviews.title: Casematix Travel Carry Case
customer_reviews.text: I would guess this case does the job, I need a larger one. I take alot of stuff with my X-BOX when I go places. Most of my stuff will not fit in this case. Had to modify it and still does not fit my cooling fans, had to buy a different box for cooling fans. But all in all it will fit my X-BOX. It will protect it up to a point, it does not like heavy bags on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: The Xbox One S fits well, and I was able to use a sharp knife to cut the foam out to carry my controller keyboard, battery charger, and cables. I think the manufacturer could have cut the foam better and/or made the box a little bigger to house two controllers. Overall it's a good buy, and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Xbox
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally dropped this with my Xbox One X, T5 SSD, and Razer controller in it. Dropped at about 4ft off the ground. Everything works perfectly as if nothing happened. Plenty of room to store your HDMI, power cable, and if you use a hard lined controller. Very impressed with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: It makes it easy for him to be mobile and enjoy his gaming ...
customer_reviews.text: Son uses this thing religiously when traveling between dorm, our home, and making his round to both sets of grandparents homes. It makes it easy for him to be mobile and enjoy his gaming with cousins, friends, etc. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Shena

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT case for XBox
customer_reviews.text: My XBox One S fits peerfectly in this case. I live in a semi truck with my husband and when we drive, I keep the XBox in this case. I've had it for months and there's no damage at all to the XBox, not even a scratch!
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit padding
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4 of these. The foam inside when i bought mine last year was much thicker feeling then the 3 I just bought for my kids last week. Still easy and convenient and most padded of ones I've seen for sale. For children who could drop their systems during transport I highly recommend this one. I've fallen with mine and xbox was perfectly safe.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Clemmons

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Hard case provides excellent protection for my xbox one. I wouldn't hesitate to take it anywhere. Built tough. Plenty of room for cables, external harddrive, and a few games if you have thin cases to put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This case is exactly what I needed. Headed out of town on business being cooped up in a hotel room for a week. This case did more than it's job on keeping my Xbox s safe! Nice and snug fit reassuring your items are safe and sound. If you are in the market for one this one exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Kryptide

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t feel as durable as it seems to be described.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a bad buy. I just wish it felt a little More sturdy. Feels plastic to me and I haven’t dropped it but I’m afraid if I do, the outside somewhere might crack. Very well patted inside though.
customer_reviews.author: Seabass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This fit my Xbox One S just perfect and it feels light when my Xbox is in their. Very helpful when traveling because it locks just fine and doesn't open unless you release the locks.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Sbeih

customer_reviews.title: Solid, secure, and perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my sons Xbox perfectly. Now he can travel between his mom and I's house without damaging it.
customer_reviews.author: James C August II

customer_reviews.title: Great for Xbox.....
customer_reviews.text: My grandson uses it all the time taking his Xbox back and forth to his dad's...
customer_reviews.author: T. Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case ...protects well and good price.
customer_reviews.text: This case is good. Protects my xbox one well and holds your accessories. The only thing is that it only can fit one controller, not two. So if your running solo its great.
customer_reviews.author: Maleko3678

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very durable it’s worth the money it’s just that the inside is like foam or something and it moves around when it’s empty so be careful about that
customer_reviews.author: isaiah

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good case but I'm still missing my power cord
customer_reviews.text: I like the case very well made just disappointed that it says it comes with a power cord and I didn't get it.
customer_reviews.author: junior

customer_reviews.title: Interior Foam
customer_reviews.text: Case is great, fits everything perfectly. I only wish that the interior foam was not the hard, brittle material it is, but a softer EVA type foam like in the top lid of the case, similar to the Xbox One X case. I feel like that would be more shock absorbent and safeer for electronics. Other than that, great case, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina McCracken

customer_reviews.title: the buckles don't hold it and popped off super easy. It's only a 2 star due to
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic case! Xbox didn't fit right in the plastic and squished out of the seams. I couldn't close it right. Then when I shoehorned it in, the buckles don't hold it and popped off super easy. It's only a 2 star due to... I don't know why the second star. It's not worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Snooter McGurkin

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great storage/traveling case for my Xbox one s, I travel on the road often and take my Xbox with me occasionally and this case made it a lot easier to transport while keeping the Xbox safer. It holds my HDMI, power cable, Xbox one s and 1 controller.
customer_reviews.author: Mace

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case seems durable. Only complaint is that you kinda have to force your Xbox One S into the cutout slot because its a little bit of a tight fit. But the console is very secure in the slot. I also wasnt able to fit both power cord and HDMI cable into the cable slot. If you travel alot I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Susen

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok. Little hard to get all the cords in but it fits. I feel like bending the cords so much may eventually damage it. But it survived checked bagged claim
customer_reviews.author: Kevilladakilla

customer_reviews.title: Secure your Xbox while traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Carried on my Xbox one S on a plane for the first time with this and was impressed. It felt secure, and had no issues. foam is a bit tight around the xbox, but that is good. May need to work it in though.
customer_reviews.author: vickersja

customer_reviews.title: Use extra lock/tie
customer_reviews.text: Xbox and controller fit nicely in the case. No worries about movement. May want to use a lock or tie on the loops inside the handle. The clips seem like they may pop open easily. Not reallly much room for more than contoller and xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my son can take his xbox to his friends house without it just thrown loosely in a backpack. It works awsome, the xbox, and controller sits securely in the foam. I feel confident that you could drop this from waist high and nothing would be damaged
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Chance

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome case! I bought 3 so we can all ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome case! I bought 3 so we can all take our Xbox when we travel. It fits everything you need. Most of our games are digital so we don't have to carry around to many game disc. If you want to take a lot of game disc, be prepared to put in your suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as heck
customer_reviews.text: Durable, sturdy, good value for the price. Have dropped it from the roof of my car with Xbox inside, literally couldn’t tell. Also fits the G-Story screen inside with the Xbox as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a Christmas gift. The recipient has indicated it does what is needed and is good quality. We would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Will M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Frequent movers
customer_reviews.text: Move around a lot, wanted something besides the Xbox box with the foam. This works perfectly for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my brother since he brings his system to work. He loved it as a Christmas gift and says it doing great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big thanks to the factory
customer_reviews.text: It was one of the best things that I bought it from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Works great, gone through TSA about 10 times now
customer_reviews.text: Works great, gone through TSA about 10 times now. No damage to the console, it will fit the new xbox one x if you trim a quarter inch off the bottom foam wall.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, it fits my cords, a controller and 4 game boxes besides the consul..nice protective foam...worry free storage and traveling with my game system...thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This case is so sturdy and travelled well
customer_reviews.text: This case is so sturdy and travelled well. It’s not heavy when it’s empty. My 1 1/2 year old carried it around empty and stood on it and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Little

customer_reviews.title: Xbox one s fits exactly like the pic---SNUG and thats a good thing for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Xbox one s fits exactly like the pic---SNUG and thats a good thing for my 9yr old---The only problem I had was with the packaging---The box it came in was HUGE ( could of fit 2 in the box ) and only a small strip of paper---I'm surprised the case did not fall out as it was being shipped to me--- The box was half opened therefore marring the case---Not that big a deal but still when you order something new you want it to come new not scratched---The case is light and easy to carry---
customer_reviews.author: Patty K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the foam inserts are very cheap and have to be cut the tiniest bit to fit better. Otherwise you are seriously cramming the Xbox in there.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel case..
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son, Dalton asked for this case. We travel a lot and he was worried about his Xbox making the travels. It is outstanding and he is very pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hofius

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this case for over a year now and no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: jme

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It is great quality and definitely gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this over a year and it’s great. My son uses it to take his Xbox everywhere and it protects it great! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A Morton

customer_reviews.title: good for a 10 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: Had the case a little over a month. Bought for my 10 year old son who takes between friends houses and each parents house. Has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very strong box. My son loved it for his Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, lifetime warranty, foam is very protective. Just what I needed. Now to find out how to fit my g story in it!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this case and gets complemented about it all the time. Everyone asks where he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Krpicak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good protective carry case to move around if you need to bring it anywhere or move.
customer_reviews.author: Trung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Hard outside case
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for my son to take on vacation with family, cause he can put a lock on it and it’s padded inside.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tarantine

customer_reviews.title: What system fits and it told me and i made it fit
customer_reviews.text: I love it i can hide my xbox so when i robed they can't find it
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and protects my xbox when I am on the go
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: One of my sons Best Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: I order this for my sons X box system for traveling and it’s so durable and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Michele Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great case the only prob was it was tricky to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case the only prob was it was tricky to get Xbox down in the foam cut out and out so I know my system will be secure in it
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I travel with my Xbox regularly and it is completely protected.
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday and protects my Xbox great. Not a problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: ROdom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Sturdy, well made. Holds everything as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on all promises
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Xbox perfectly and it makes me confident to travel with it
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protective case but wish it had room for 2 controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the Console safe
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth buying when traveling keeps everything safe even with a game guide and a battery charging pack

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The foam stuff on the inside isn't great. Case is solid.
customer_reviews.author: leah solomon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase everything fit like a glove.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Case For Xbox 1s
customer_reviews.text: The best thing since sliced lightbread. Fits snug, and very sturdy....

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son love, have a lot of space to put everything

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item as described Thank you - a great protective case

customer_reviews.title: No place for wires
customer_reviews.text: Real snug fit... No problems there... But there's no place to put the wires

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what is is meant to be used for

customer_reviews.title: Good case for price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, protects Xbox and games. Wish there was room for headset.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Awfull product cheap and worthless not worth the money buy a back pack less money and just add pillow cases better options than this will return console doesn't even fit in the case
customer_reviews.author: Paul Capricorñe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the OTR truck driver
customer_reviews.text: The foam cushioning and durable exterior makes it great for storing my Xbox 1S in my semi as it bounces down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Xereth

product_meta.title: CASEMATIX Travel Case Compatible with Xbox One S - Hard Shell Xbox One S Carrying Case with Protective Foam Compartments for Console, Controller, Power Adapter, Games and More Accessories
feature_bullets: 🎮 XBOX ONE S BAG TRAVEL CARRY CASE - This impact-absorbing XBOX One S Travel Case was designed especially to fit your XBOX One S console, controller, cables, games & other accessories. DESIGNED FOR XBOX ONE S ONLY, NOT X OR ORIGINAL!

🎮 HARD SHELL COMPOSITE PLASTIC EXTERIOR - Each case's exterior is constructed from crushproof, blow-mold composite plastic that offers your console unparalleled protection from impacts and makes this the ultimate XBOX One S Case travel solution.

🎮 IMPACT-ABSORBING FOAM INTERIOR - The custom-cut foam interior (sized specifically for the XBOX One S and accessories) perfectly houses your console and provides dense, varied protection against impacts and damage from all angles.

🎮 PADLOCK RINGS FOR ADDED SECURITY - Each case features 4 padlock rings molded directly into the case exterior, allowing you to add padlocks for traveling or shipping. Rest assured your gaming console will be secure with CASEMATIX protection.

🎮 MADE IN THE USA - Proudly manufactured, hand-assembled and inspected in the USA. XBOX One X carry case dimensions measure 17.0" x 14.0" x 6.0" and interior has been sized for the XBOX One X console ONLY. Will not fit XBOX One, XBOX One S, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars175 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
